name: Qism al-Tahfeez
description: * Information source - www.elearningquran.com * User cannot access an App if he/she is Not Registered with ELearningQuran website.  * Internet Required.   Available Features :  - Daily Hifz Tips - Track Hifz Progress - Track Murajah Progress - Get Your Takhteet For Hifz - Ikhtebaar Report - Pending Payment and Transaction History - Latest Available On Jamea Publications. - And Many More ....  Note : Login by ITS ID and Password.  Privacy Policy: * Login Information is encrypted. and cannot be shared with any one. * Profile information is for view only purpose, it will not be shared with anyone. * There is no payment module in this app, you can only view payment history (Data from ElearningQuran website)
